summary: This mod reduces facial blockiness of the new \"Bat-face\" Vampires featured in Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff28282][size=4][b]Description:[/color][/size][/b]

Oops, they did it again! Bethesda released Dawnguard with highly compressed, blocky and low-res normals again. How they could possible do it again? I don\'t know but they did... This is my very small contribution to help combat such an oversight. Enjoy!

The screenshots may not adequately show the improvements. The improvements are kind of subtle to begin with so some of you may not have even noticed the blockiness to begin with. Especially considering their wrinkled faces. I noticed and i could stop noticing afterwards, that\'s why i did these. Hope you like it!


[color=#ff28282][size=4][b]Installation:[/color][/size][/b]

Place textures in...

Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femaleheadvampire_msn.dds
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\male\\maleheadvampire_msn.dds


[size=5][color=#FF2828][b]My other mods:[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15664] Mystical Illumination - Glowing Signs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7587]Height Adjusted Races with True Giants[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5711]Closer Quivers and Arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4764]Torch of Everlasting[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1039]HD Normals v1 - Female Faces[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21688]Improved Normals - Dawnguard Vampire[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4769]Increased Spell and Power Durations[/url][/size]
author: EvilDeadAsh34
